wikipedia_page.main: Pete Brown (born 1968) is an English writer who has written extensively on the subject of beer and drinking cultures around the world. He has written eleven books; Man Walks Into a Pub, Three Sheets to the Wind, Hops and Glory, Shakespeare's Local, World's Best Cider, The Pub, Miracle Brew, The Apple Orchard, Pie Fidelity, Craft: An Argument and Beer By Design: The Art of Good Beer Branding. Brown, who was born in Barnsley, West Riding of Yorkshire, lives in London.
